description: Try our easy to follow Tofu Laksa With Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Laksa,Pescatarian,Broccolini,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tofu,Dairy free
name: Tofu Laksa With Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak noodles in boiling water for 10 minutes to soften. Drain.
Meanwhile, combine coconut milk, stock, laksa paste and lemon grass in a large saucepan and bring to the boil. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add tofu, broccolini and noodles. Simmer for 5 minutes until broccolini is just tender. Divide evenly into bowls, top with bean shoots, onion and mint. Serve with lime wedges and chilli.
